title: Keld questions because i missed the Q&A
body: Due to the way he works, with half his health on his pet and half on him, how do items and abilities work with him?  Like say i bought {{item:3083}} is the health factored on what HIS health is (no pet bonus health)?  Does it change depending on if he's mounted?    How about abilities that do % health damage, do i do a % of his health?  a % of the total between him and his pet?

replies.body: % health effects use the combination of Skarl and Kled's health.
Then how does health regen affect both Skaarl and Kled?
everything that works with kled, works with skaarl.
So both will gain the health regen at the same time or half and half?
Wait why are you refering to Kled?  The article is clearly asking about that other guy "Keld" in the title.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Rm9juebX,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-11T09:21:55.742+0000)
>
> % health effects use the combination of Skarl and Kled's health.

Thank you.

As a follow up, with regards to Keld's ultimate.  is the auto targeting based off vision or just general area around him?  For example i'm hiding in bush as he rolls by, will he target me?  Also how does the AI work if he locks onto some like {{champion:7}} who then proceeds to dash over a wall.  Will he attempt to follow her?  Assuming yes, what happens if she returns over the wall?
